attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo setenforce 0 #diabable SElinux - runtime

sudo sed -i "s/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=disabled/g" /etc/sysconfig/selinux #diable SELINUX after reboot

sudo yum update -y nss curl libcurl #installs updated lib to make git work

sudo yum install -y git 


sudo yum install -y epel-release
sudo yum install -y nginx


sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html

cd /var/www/html/

git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git
mv -f /var/www/html/uptick/* /var/www/html/
rm -rf /var/www/html/uptick

chmod -R 755 /var/www/html/*


sudo sed -i "s|/usr/share/nginx/html;|/var/www/html;|g" /etc/nginx/nginx.conf



sudo systemctl start nginx

sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-service=http
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-service=https
sudo firewall-cmd --permanent --zone=public --add-port=3000/tcp
sudo firewall-cmd --reload


sudo systemctl enable nginx

sudo yum install -y curl 
curl --silent --location https://rpm.nodesource.com/setup_9.x | sudo bash -
sudo yum install -y nodejs
sudo yum install -y gcc-c++ make
cd /var/www/html
npm build
npm install -g forever


sudo sed -i "s/DB_SERVER_IPADDRESS/10.21.86.250/g" /var/www/html/config/mysqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i "s/DB_USER/root/g" /var/www/html/config/mysqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i "s|DB_PASSWORD|nutanix/4u|g" /var/www/html/config/mysqlConfig.js
sudo sed -i "s/DB_NAME/Uptick/g" /var/www/html/config/mysqlConfig.js

sudo sed -i "s/NODE_SERVER_IP_ADDRESS/@@{address}@@/g" /var/www/html/js/data.js

echo yay!

forever start server.js

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
